divs: Sighting Detailsfriday dec 16th 2011 @ 1:45 - about 2 am i was watching tv & my husband came in from smoking. while out he got a creepy feeling like he was being watched & looked around & noticed this weird light move around all weird. he came in to get me & i watched it from the window. the first second or 2 i thought oh thats prob just a plane but then i noticed all the light changes (red, yellow, blue-violet, orange, green, & white, with no more than 2-3 at a time) it started to fly up, down, north, south, closer(east), further (west), S patterns, right angles, hovering, wiggles. when i saw that i knew this wasn't normal. i grabbed my phone (which dosen't have vid) to take a pic, but the light wasn't bright enough. i then started to voice record what i was seeing. i have a 10 min recording & a 2 min recording. it's cold out so the window started to fog so i grabed a jacket and went outside. i could see it much better outside. i was having a hard time lighting my cig cuz i didn't want to look away & truthfully it was starting to sink in & i was getting freaked out. after afew mins we began to hear a helicptor or jet (something loud) comming from the north. now where were at most planes fly in angles or east west heading to or from chicago. sometimes you'll see north south but they're pretty far to the west. anyway, shortly after this it just went off (now the whole time it would go on and off but come back pretty quick) we thought it was gone & stopped my first recording. about 30 sec latter it came back on and a flash fell from the sky but to the north of it. it could've been a shooting star though, but still kind of odd. we then noticed that we no longer heard the jet sound (we never saw a plane) but we started to hear a weird hum sound from the east & saw a small blinking light to the north. we got freaked out and went in at that point. a few mins latter my husband went out & it was gone. within 5 mins after comming in my eyes started to hurt and they're killing me right now. i'm actually having a hard time writing this cuz i've now got a bad migrane. i was fine before. while i've been writing this my husband has been surfing to see if anything has been going on around here lately. he happen to think of the base thtas about under the where object was (you could see it had a shape & wasn't just a light) anyway this base is an old nike missle site. i guess parts are open to the public so he was like hey whats it like over there & honestly i have no clue it's almost hidden by vegitation ever since i can remember. at least as far back as 1984. the weird thing is the base is closed to the public starting dec 16th which it now is. my eyes & head are hurting bad. this base is about a mile west of us. about a mile or 2 south-east of portage, in.
